The 20th division of the vernier scale exactly coincides with one of the main scale divisions. Match the columns. 
Column-I (Physical quantity)
 A. Magnetic Induction
 B. Electrical resistance
 C. Specific heat
 D. Latent heat

Column-II (Dimension)
 p. $[L^{2}T^{-2}K^{-1}]$
 q. $[ML^{2}T^{-3}A^{-2}]$
 r. $[ML^{0}T^{-2}A^{-1}]$
 s. $[L^{2}T^{-2}]$

Column-I (Physical quantity)
 A. Wavelength
 B. Time
 C. Pressure
 D. Power

 p. $[ML^{2}T^{-3}]$
 q. $[M^{1}L^{-1}T^{-2}]$

Column-I (Physical quantity)
 A. Speed of light
 B. Planck's constant
